text: Agnes of God is a 1985 American Canadian mystery drama movie. It was directed by Norman Jewison. The movie is based on the play of the same name by John Pielmeier. Actors include Jane Fonda, Anne Bancroft, Meg Tilly, Anne Pitoniak, and Winston Rekert. It was distributed by Columbia Pictures. It was nominated for 3 Academy Awards in 1986. ==Other websites== * * * Category:1985 drama movies Category:1985 mystery movies Category:American mystery movies Category:1980s American drama movies Category:Canadian mystery movies Category:Canadian drama movies Category:Movies based on plays Category:Movies directed by Norman Jewison Category:Columbia Pictures movies Category:Movies about psychiatry Category:Movies set in Montreal Category:Movies set in convents Category:Movies about Catholicism
title: Agnes of God (movie)
